Translations.Text: veyestembiuneke ehakkun hu. kul i verabbi innehu lehakkuv vema entum bimu`cizin
velev enne likulli nefsin zalemet ma fi-l'ardi leftedet bih. veeserru-nnedamete lemma raevu-l`azab. vekudiye beynehum bilkisti vehum la yuzlemun
ela inne lillahi ma fi-ssemavati vel'ard. ela inne va`de-llahi hakkuv velakinne ekserahum la ya`lemun
ya eyyuhe-nnasu kad caetkum mev`izatum mir rabbikum vesifaul lima fi-ssuduri vehudev verahmetul lilmu'minin
kul bifadli-llahi vebirahmetihi febizalike felyefrahu. huve hayrum mimma yecme`un
kul era'eytum ma enzele-llahu lekum mir rizkin fece`altum minhu haramev vehalala. kul ellahu ezine lekum em `ale-llahi tefterun
vema zannu-llezine yefterune `ale-llahi-lkezibe yevme-lkiyameh. inne-llahe lezu fadlin `ale-nnasi velakinne ekserahum la yeskurun

vema tekunu fi se'niv vema tetlu minhu min kur'aniv vela ta`melune min `amelin illa kunna `aleykum suhuden iz tufidune fih. vema ya`zubu `ar rabbike mim miskali zerratin fi-l'ardi vela fi-ssemai vela asgara min zalike vela ekbera illa fi kitabim mubin
ela inne evliyae-llahi la havfun `aleyhim vela hum yahzenun
lehumu-lbusra fi-lhayati-ddunya vefi-l'ahirah. la tebdile likelimati-llah. zalike huve-lfevzu-l`azim
vela yahzunke kavluhum. inne-l`izzete lillahi cemi`a. huve-ssemi`u-l`alim
ela inne lillahi men fi-ssemavati vemen fi-l'ard. vema yettebi`u-llezine yed`une min duni-llahi suraka'. iy yettebi`une ille-zzanne vein hum illa yahrusun
huve-llezi ce`ale lekumu-lleyle liteskunu fihi vennehara mubsira. inne fi zalike leayatil likavmiy yesme`un
kalu-ttehaze-llahu veleden subhaneh. huve-lganiyy. lehu ma fi-ssemavati vema fi-l'ard. in `indekum min sultanim bihaza. etekulune `ale-llahi ma la ta`lemun
meta`un fi-ddunya summe ileyna merci`uhum summe nuzikuhumu-l`azabe-ssedide bima kanu yekfurun
